review: I had to send it back and get a roku box instead. Most of the HDMI dongles that allow streaming have terrible wifi range. I was not even able to set up an account on this device because the signal dropped frequently, while other devices on the network worked properly. I would suggest buying the amazon fire box or roku box.
author: Sybil H. Berkley "S Berkley"

review: Love it. Got two, as it's so much easier than moving the one from TV in bedroom to TV in Den. Works better for Amazon movies than my smart TV (faster and smoother). I am now thinking that I need a Fire HDX 8.9 so I can take full advantage. Don't really need a tablet but the 8.9 looks awful tempting. I have only had them for a few months with no problems streaming content with Charter or Brighthouse Internet service. I do carry them back and forth from 2nd home for now.
